00044 class Image

00049     {

00051         Format_ARGB,
00052     };

00093 
00094 inline const Color32 & Image::pixel(uint x, uint y) const
00095 {
00096     return pixel(y * width() + x);
00097 }
00098 
00099 inline Color32 & Image::pixel(uint x, uint y)
00100 {
00101     return pixel(y * width() + x);
00102 }
